titleStmt.title: The East-India-trade a most profitable trade to the kingdom and best secured and improved in a company and a joint-stock / represented in a letter written upon the occasion to two letters lately published insinuating the contrary.
titleStmt.author: Papillon, Thomas, 1623-1702.

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Papillon. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
